amendment.description: To provide for implementation of the Pacific Albacore Tuna Treaty, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2935 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2935 proposed by Senator Frist for Senator McCain. (consideration: CR S3115-3116; text: CR S3115-3116) To provide for implementation of the Pacific Albacore Tuna Treaty, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2935 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2935 proposed by Senator Frist for Senator McCain.
